00026 require_once(PATH_tslib.'class.tslib_eidtools.php');
00027 require_once (t3lib_extMgm::extPath('servicemgr').'class.tx_servicemgr_download.php');

00038 class tx_servicemgr_download_testcase extends tx_t3unit_testcase {
00039 
00040     function test_str2download() {
00041         $txSMgr_download = new tx_servicemgr_download;
00042         $result = $txSMgr_download->str2download('Ähmm, döses String - ist [ein] Test.string!');
00043         self::assertEquals($result, 'Aehmm-doeses-String-ist-ein-Teststring', 'str2download result: '.$result);
00044         $result = $txSMgr_download->str2download('Ähmm, döses String - ist [ein] Test.string!', false);
00045         self::assertEquals($result, 'Aehmm-doeses-String-ist-ein-Test.string', 'str2download result: '.$result);
00046     }
00047     
00048     function test_fileExtension() {
00049         $txSMgr_download = new tx_servicemgr_download;
00050         $result = $txSMgr_download->fileExtension('hallo.hgt');
00051         self::assertEquals($result, 'hgt', 'fileExtension result: '.$result);
00052         $result = $txSMgr_download->fileExtension('ha.llo.xgud');
00053         self::assertEquals($result, 'xgud', 'fileExtension result: '.$result);
00054     }
00055 }
